channel.title: Server help
channel.description:
im currently slowly making my own server.
i have only just started and am not smartest person :P so yeh.
i need help on making my game rule.i got into my router properties thing and then clicked on advanced up top. and then there was no gaming tab on the left. or anywhere for that matter. but there was a "virtual server" tab. i clicked it and this came up
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/3594/serverhelpsm5.png[/img][/URL]
and i have no idea how to make the rule from here. i need some detailed help please
